title: Armour salesman

properties.name: description
properties.value: Aaron the Armour salesman is the owner of Aaron's Archery Appendages. in the Ranging Guild. His shop sells low level Ranged armour. Players who have achieved 99 Ranged can purchase the Ranged Cape of Accomplishment from him for 99,000 coins.

Armour salesman

Advanced data
NPC ID6059

Aaron the Armour salesman is the owner of Aaron's Archery Appendages. in the Ranging Guild. His shop sells low level Ranged armour. Players who have achieved 99 Ranged can purchase the Ranged Cape of Accomplishment from him for 99,000 coins.

Ranging cape[edit | edit source]

If a player has 99 Ranged, they will have access to a duplicate version of the shop, with the only difference being the addition of the Ranging cape. The stock of this shop is not shared with the regular shop.

ItemNumber
in stock		Restock
time		Price
sold at		Price
bought at		GE
price
Ranging cape10.6s 99,000N/ANot sold

Ranging cape(t)[edit | edit source]

For players with 99 Ranged and at least one other 99, they will access a second duplicate shop. Just like the previous, the stock of this shop is not shared with the others.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
29 March 2004
(update)

The NPC was permanently added with the launch of RuneScape 2.

21 January 2004
(update)

The NPC was released ingame to the RuneScape 2 Beta.

1 December 2003
(update)

The NPC was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta cache.

present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • He is the only skillcape salesman who wears the matching hood of his skillcape.
  • His name is not given in-game or in chat, but can be found out from the name of his shop, Aaron's Archery Appendages.
  • He wields a two-handed weapon and a shield, in this case a longbow and a steel kiteshield, at the same time. This is similar to how Vannaka wields both a two-handed weapon and a shield at the same time.
